messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What type of metal is required for the dagger in the Summon Dimensional Shambler spell?
Copper or iron
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of enchanting the dagger on the chance of success for the Summon Dimensional Shambler spell?
Rises by 2 percentiles per point of POW in the dagger
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of bright sunlight on the Summon Dimensional Shambler spell?
Shamblers are more easily confused in bright sunlight
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does it take for a being to appear after a successful cast of the Summon Dimensional Shambler spell?
2D10 game minutes after the chant concludes
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a characteristic that makes shamblers more easily confused?
They are more easily confused in bright sunlight.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a condition that may be required for the thing appearing after a spell is cast?
A Sanity loss to see it.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the requirement for casting the Summon Fire Vampire spell?
A bonfire or other source of flame is required.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the best time to cast the Summon Fire Vampire spell?
September through November, when the star Fomalhaut is above the horizon.

Only at night

night

no

The caster and vanishes
